sentences.sContent: But they can produce useable optical and infrared data.
sentences.sContent_eng: But they can produce useable optical and infrared data.
sentences.sCn: 但是它们可以提供可用的光学和红外数据。

sentences.sContent: For every container it displays ID, name, type, total pages, useable pages, and whether the container is currently accessible or not.
sentences.sContent_eng: For every container it displays ID, name, type, total pages, useable pages, and whether the container is currently accessible or not.
sentences.sCn: 而对于每个容器，它将显示其 ID、名称、类型、可用的页以及该容器当前是否可被访问。

sentences.sContent: Many guidelines exist to aid in the creation of useable graphical interfaces, but few exist to guide the co-development of accessible interfaces.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many guidelines exist to aid in the creation of useable graphical interfaces, but few exist to guide the co-development of accessible interfaces.
sentences.sCn: 有很多指导原则可以帮助创建可用的图形化界面，但是很少能够为同时开发可访问界面提供帮助。

synos.tran: 可用的；便于使用的（等于usable）

words.tran: 有用的，有益的；有帮助的
习惯的；二手的，使用过的
